channel.title: Israel – Indigenous Values Initiative
channel.description: NYA WEÑHA SKÄ NOÑH: Thank you for being well

item.title: UPDATED: Carrier Dome Scrimmage Schedule
item.dc:creator: Adam DJ Brett
item.description: The final event of the Deyhontsigwa’ehs-The Creator’s Game, Lacrosse Weekend, hashtag #laxweekend17, will be a three way scrimmage between the Syracuse University Men’s Lacrosse Team, The Iroquois Nationals, and Team israel Lacrosse. These scrimmages are sure to delight fans. … Read More
item.content:encoded:
Schedule Change: The Israel vs. Syracuse Scrimmage will now take place at 12:30

The final event of the Deyhontsigwa’ehs-The Creator’s Game, Lacrosse Weekend, hashtag #laxweekend17, will be a three way scrimmage between the Syracuse University Men’s Lacrosse Team, The Iroquois Nationals, and Team israel Lacrosse. These scrimmages are sure to delight fans.

Tickets can be purchased soon for $10 with parking available for $5.

Schedule

  • Iroquois vs. Israel (11:00)
  • Israel vs. Syracuse (12:30)
  • Syracuse vs. Iroquois (3:00)

Download the Carrier Dome Scrimmage Flyer

For more about all the exciting things happening during the Lacrosse Weekend like the Lacrosse All-Stars North American Invitational (LASNAI) Box Lacrosse tournament see our page on the Lacrosse Weekend. The event hashtag is: #laxweekend17 .

Select Highlights of Deyhontsigwa’ehs

  • LASNAI Box Tournament at Tsha’ Thoñ’nhes (The Onondaga Nation Field House). Advance 3 Day passes are $25.00. Day of passes will be available at the door each day for $15, and Kids (10 & under) get in for only $5.
  • The Wooden Stick Festival will be happening concurrently with LASNAI out at Tsha’ Thoñ’nhes and will be free
  • Thompson Brothers Youth Lacrosse Camp
  • Stay tuned for more
